SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.controller

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.controller.Configuration
public class Configuration extends Object
This class is used to read the JSON configuration file, that will be bundled in the JAR.

    • getJSON

      private static org.json.JSONObject getJSON()
      Get the JSON object from the constraint file
      Returns:
      The JSON object

    • createPersonalGoalDeck

      public static List<PersonalGoalCard> createPersonalGoalDeck()
      Initialize the deck of personal goal cards from the specification file. The file contains a list of constraint for each card. The file has this format: "personal_goal_cards": { "cards": [ [ {"col": int, "row": int, "type": string (ItemType)}, {"col": int, "row": int, "type": string (ItemType)}, {"col": int, "row": int, "type": string (ItemType)} ], [...], ... ], "map_points": { "1": 1, "2": 3, "3": 6, "4": 8 } }

    • getPersonalGoalPoints

      public static Map<Integer,Integer> getPersonalGoalPoints()
      Return the association between the number of tiles matching a personal goal and the corresponding number of points.
      Returns:
      The map of points for each number of matches

    • getCommonGoalCardDescription

      public static String getCommonGoalCardDescription(String id)
      Return the description of the common goal card with the given id
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the card
      Returns:
      The description of the card

    • getFinalPoints

      static int getFinalPoints()
      Get the number of points that the player gets for completing the game first.
      Returns:
      The number of points

    • getBoardMask

      public static int[][] getBoardMask()
      Get the board mask from the specification file. The mask specifies how many players have to be present in the game for the board cell to be "active".
      Returns:
      The mask as a 2D array of integers

    • getBoardDimension

      public static int getBoardDimension()
      Get the dimension of the board

      The dimension of the board

    • getTimerTimeout

      public static int getTimerTimeout()
      Get the timeout of the timer in order to handle the disconnection of a player
      Returns:
      The timeout of the timer in millisecond

    • getMapPointsGroup

      public static HashMap<Integer,Integer> getMapPointsGroup()
      Get the points that a player gets for a group of adjacent tiles of the same type
      Returns:
      Mapping between the number of tiles of the same type adjacent and the number of points

    • getServerAddress

      public static String getServerAddress()
      Get the (default) address of the server. This value can be overridden by the command line arguments.
      Returns:
      The address of the server

      public static int getServerSocketPort()
